title: Putin invited Trump to Moscow to discuss Ukraine, Kremlin says
shortDescription: Russian President Vladimir Putin and President Donald Trump discussed ending the war in Ukraine, and Putin invited Trump to Moscow, the Kremlin said.

title: Eric Adams sees fortunes turn on Trump actions | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: American teacher Marc Fogel has been released by Russia after more than three years in custody. | Flu cases surge to highest levels in 15 years.

title: Tulsi Gabbard confirmed by Senate as national intelligence director
shortDescription: As director of national intelligence, Gabbard will oversee the U.S. intelligence community and serve as the president's top adviser on intelligence.

title: Federal watchdogs Trump fired sue to get their jobs back
shortDescription: Inspectors general fired by President Donald Trump are suing to get their jobs back as watchdogs for waste and fraud at federal agencies.

title: Susan Collins is again under pressure over backing or bucking Trump
shortDescription: The independent Republican senator is up for reelection in 2026, giving her some insulation from GOP critics.

title: Today is Abraham Lincoln's birthday, a president Trump is fixated on
shortDescription: President Lincoln, regarded by historians as one of the best presidents in history, was born on this day in 1809. He is frequently invoked by Trump.

title: North Korea condemns Trump's Gaza takeover proposal as 'bluster'
shortDescription: North Korean state media on Wednesday denounced Trump's proposal to take over Gaza and relocate Palestinians and accused Washington of robbery.

title: Trump signs order to cut down federal workforce
shortDescription: Elon Musk joined President Donald Trump in the Oval Office as he signed an executive order aimed at cutting the federal workforce.

title: Senators: Trump hiring freeze means firefighting jobs are unfilled
shortDescription: Wildland firefighters around the country say they've had job offers rescinded or frozen in the wake of President Donald Trump's federal hiring freeze.

title: Trump loses bid to pause judge's order barring funding freezes
shortDescription: A Boston-based appeals court ruled on Tuesday that Trump is still barred for now from freezing federal grants, loans and other financial assistance.

title: Trump, joined by Musk, orders up sweeping cuts to federal workforce
shortDescription: President Trump signed an executive order Tuesday that seeks to "significantly reduce the size of government" through Elon Musk's DOGE.

title: Senate Democrat says FBI nominee Kash Patel may have perjured himself
shortDescription: A key Senate Democrat said FBI nominee Kash Patel 'may have committed perjury' about a staff purge, but a spokesperson called it 'second-hand gossip.'
